subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. danced, dodged and repeatedly snapped Saúl Álvarez’s head and spirit to its breaking point, as he improved his record to 45-0 with a majority decision victory.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr. danced, dodged and repeatedly snapped Saúl Álvarez’s head and spirit to its breaking point, as he improved his record to 45-0 with a majority decision victory.
